"""Test the inverse stand-alone carbon cycle."""
c1 = 278 * 1.01
c_acc0 = 0
e0 = 0
temp = 0
time_scale_sf = 0.16
c_pi = 278
c0 = 278
carbon_boxes0 = np.zeros(4)
e1, c_acc1, carbon_boxes1, time_scale_sf = fair.inverse.inverse_carbon_cycle(c1
    , c_acc0, temp, carbon.r0, carbon.rc, carbon.rt, carbon.iirf_max,
    time_scale_sf, carbon.a, carbon.tau, carbon.iirf_h, carbon_boxes0, c_pi,
    c0, e0)
